title: TATA group company to operate Cochin Airport's hotel project with Rs 100 crore investment
description: CIAL constructed the hotel, which is ideally located near the airport entrance, as part of its land utilisation programme and also to provide the passengers with hospitality services at par with international standards. Taj CIAL at Cochin Airport is expected to be launched by middle of 2024.
